scene.name: Page turning setup
scene.description: An open book or notebook placed on a desk

task.name: Turn a page
task.description: The action of flipping a single page in a book
task.spoken_prompt: Task: Please turn the page of the book.
task.spoken_prompt_cn: 任务描述：请翻一下书页。

subtasks.spoken_prompt_cn: 子任务描述：进行翻页操作。

steps.description: Start turning the page of the book
steps.spoken_prompt: Step one: start turning the page.

constraints.notes: Use the thumb and index finger to separate a single sheet and flip it to the other side.
